entries.author: Mike Julian
entries.content: Sadly, the cause and effect are backward: the success that team experienced led them to create the tools and procedures, not the other way around

entries.author: Mike Julian
entries.content: Opt for collecting metrics at least every 60 seconds.

entries.author: Mike Julian
entries.content: Lastly, augment your on-call with tools such as PagerDuty, VictorOps, OpsGenie, etc
